org.codehaus.mojo.versions

Class UseNextReleasesMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
        • org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsDependencyUpdaterMojo
          • org.codehaus.mojo.versions.UseNextReleasesMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class UseNextReleasesMojo
extends AbstractVersionsDependencyUpdaterMojo
    Replaces any release versions with the next release version (if it has been released).
    Since:
    1.0-alpha-3
    Author:
    Stephen Connolly
    Requires a Maven project to run:
    true
    Is defined by the goal name:
    use-next-releases
    Requires a direct invocation by the user:
    true
